body.markdown: A [pocketbase](https://pocketbase.io/) plugin ecosystem and set of tools for building custom pocketbase binaries with plugins written in Go.
body.rendered: A pocketbase plugin ecosystem and set of tools for building custom pocketbase binaries with plugins written in Go.

body.markdown: You can browse for plugins and even download pocketbase builds directly from the [PocketBuilds](https://pocketbuilds.com) website (coming soon).
body.rendered: You can browse for plugins and even download pocketbase builds directly from the PocketBuilds website (coming soon).
